articles.title: A President Impeached, and a Nation Convulsed
articles.description: The impeachment battles over Andrew Johnson, Richard M. Nixon and Bill Clinton came at turning points in the American story. The time that produced President Trump has proved to be another one.

articles.description: A court said leaders of the politically powerful Ampatuan dynasty were behind the 2009 massacre of a politician’s supporters and members of the media in the southern Philippines.
